See Live Source Code

Face Obstruction Detection Web System

The primary goal of this system is to detect individuals entering the bus whose faces are obstructed. The purpose behind this initiative is to mitigate the occurrence of criminal incidents within the bus premises. The system employs the openCV library, utilizing haarcascade and lbpcascade trained models to accurately identify and flag instances where individuals have their faces covered. By leveraging computer vision technology, this system aims to enhance safety measures by alerting authorities to potential security risks inside the bus. Continuous monitoring and analysis enable proactive measures to ensure the safety and security of passengers and prevent untoward incidents.

See Live Source Code
